random.line: Good Morning, Sis! You sleep well?

choice.line: Yes, I slept wonderfully.
You sure did! It's 10:00! I thought you would never get up!
I need my beauty sleep, Kanna.
No, I had this weird dream last night.
About what, our creepy neighbor?
I said a weird dream, not a nightmare. It probably has some cryptic meaning into my future.
Maybe you shouldn't eat pizza before going to bed.

random.line: Hey, Sis! You're just in time for lunch. Today it's curry! My favorite!
We eat curry too often because of you.
Aww come on, Sis. It's only the third time this week!
I'm good. You're always so lively in the mornings.
Must be because of all the sugar I eat!

converse.line: You have anything you want, Kanna?

choice.line: Do you want to travel to anywhere?
Sis, what kind of question is that? You know I want to go to Japan!
Any new food you want to try?
Hmm...

Well, there is a candy I saw last month that looks so cool! An old lady was giving some to her grandson when I passed by. I wanted to try some, but I haven't been able to find it anywhere else for months.
(What an obscure request...) You got it! I'll find it for you.
I'll be surprised if you find it, Sis.
I mean anything at all that you desire.
Then I'd like a TV, a pony, a spaceship, a--
Okay, okay! Never mind.
Do you remember what today is?
I do... I don't want to though.
Sorry I brought it up.
What was it you said you wanted again?
You've forgotten already? Wow, Sis. Wow. I wanted some candy that an old lady had. I don't know the details of where she is or if she even has anymore.
I'll beat the odds and find it.

converse.line: Mrs. Nakamura gave me some of the candy you wanted. It's called konpeito. Try some.
Whoa! Just as cool as I remembered it! I'll try some...
IT'S SOOOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!!!! I've never tasted a sweet this good! Thanks, Sis!
(So loud!) No problem, Kanna. Make sure you thank Mrs. Nakamura.
Don't you worry. I'll be over there every day of the week now to eat this stuff! We'll become best buds!
That's great to hear. She needs some cheering up. Be nice to her.

choice.line: Guess who I met this morning?
Mrs. Nakamura?! Did you get more konpeito? You gotta share some, Sis!
You've got to calm down. You've had that candy nonstop on your mind ever since I gave you some.
I visited Dad.
Oh, okay...
Still recovering from that candy?
I'll never fully recover! It was just that great! Now I want to go to Japan even more!
And do what?
Eat all kinds of food and learn about their culture! I love everything Japanese! I want to be Japanese when I grow up!
...I don't think that's how it works.
